metadata.dc:author: Alió, J
Castells, E
Esplugas, E
Cequier, A
Shaw, E
López-Gómez, D
metadata.dc:description: Giant pseudoaneurysms of coronary arteries in patients with Behçet's disease is a uncommon finding. It has been described exceptionally in the literature. We present a case of giant pseudoaneurysm of the left anterior descending coronary artery with obstruction of the right ventricular outflow in a patient with Behçet's disease. He improved after surgical resection and steroid treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Obstrucción del tracto de salida del ventrículo derecho por un seudoaneurisma gigante de la arteria coronaria descendente anterior en un paciente con enfermedad de Behçet.
[Right ventricular outflow obstruction due to a giant pseudoaneurysm of the anterior descending coronary artery in a patient with Behçet's disease].
